name: Z World
description:
Z WORLD is new action open world 3D life simulator game.

Build your life by interacting with NPCs!

There are various career paths available to make money differently.
You can loot by defending innocent civilians from the random invaders and get loot from them.

Z WORLD features various weapon types, attack moves, pets, buildings, vehicles, furniture, avatars, and unique skills.
The game also features MMO styled multiplayer that you can join or leave on your own free will.

Your single player progress is shared with your multiplayers.
In multiplayer mode, you can PvP or co-op with other players.
